name: stock_get_stock_earnings_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yh_finance_v2.
Tool description: 
API description: Fetches the stock earnings data for a given symbol and region using the RapidAPI service.

symbol.description: Ticker Symbol ( Ex. \\\\\\\\\"AAPL\\\\\\\\\" is Ticker symbol for Apple Inc. on the stock market )

region.description: The region code for the stock market (default is 'US'). Allowed values include US, BR, AU, CA, FR, DE, HK, IN, IT, ES, GB, and S.
